item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This article will cover the tools I use, the operating system I use, the programming language I use, and my git statistics.

item.title: Fix 'File/Application is damaged and cannot be opened'
item.description: You may get errors “File/App is damaged and cannot be opened. You should move it to Trash.” when opening files or applications on macOS Ventura/Monterey/Big Sur/Catalina, especially on M1 or M2 Macs. This article will tell you the solution.

item.title: Solution to the ssh error 'no matching host key type found. Their offer: ssh-rsa'
item.description: When we use an SSH-related service, we might get the error “no matching host key type found. Their offer: ssh-rsa”. This article will tell you how to solve this problem.
